11.name: #1 - Welcome, Welcome!!!
11.subject: Welcome to TrainerDay! Time to Shift into Gear :bicyclist:‚Äç:dash:
11.html_content:
Hi {contactfield=firstname}! 

WELCOME
I‚Äôm Alex, founder of TrainerDay, and I‚Äôm thrilled to have you in our peloton! The whole reason our small but mighty team exists is to help you hit your goals and leave any performance roadblocks in the dust. We‚Äôve got your back (and your legs!) covered.

PEDAL INTO SAVINGS:
It's cheaper on to buy on our website! üö¥‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è   Forget flat tires, avoid app store markups!

Website: $3.99/month (or $39.99/year)

App Stores: $4.99/month (depending on country/currency)

If you want to see how the premium version works in our mobile training
app.  Here is a simplied video to help.
https://youtu.be/0IhJAC6YzCA


FREEBIES FOR YOUR CYCLING TOOLKIT
Thousands of community workouts and training plans, all downloadable for FREE! Build your own plans, workouts, and libraries. Even better, you can load these into other apps like GoldenCheetah, all without spending a dime. Of course, if you want to use them in our app, you‚Äôll need to upgrade‚Äîkind of like getting those aero wheels you've had your eye on. üòâ


OUR PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
Our app and website come loaded with features
The awesome Coach Jack Plan Builder
And plenty more to take your training to the next level
Don‚Äôt forget about our yearly discount: only $39.95 if you go all-in for the year. It‚Äôs the lowest price around‚Äîour version of an early breakaway!
See Pricing


MEET COACH JACK:
Think of Coach Jack as your personal cycling Yoda, minus the lightsaber. Created by world-renowned coach Andrea Morelli, it‚Äôs grounded in the latest science (because who wants outdated training methods?). Expect clear progressions, easier early intervals, and lots of Zone 2 time‚Äîuntil you're ready to crank things up.


FASTEST WARMUP EVER
Our mobile training app gets you warming up in 6 seconds flat! And it's super flexible, letting you tweak your workouts on the fly. Free users get 20 workouts, but you can mix and match them like gears for endless combinations.
Oh, and our iOS app works on M-Series Macs too. Extra bonus!
Download Now


TRAINERDAY + OTHER APPS
Zwift through the winter, crush outdoor rides with TrainerDay all season long. Sync your calendar to all major platforms and devices using TrainingPeaks (free or paid TP version).


JOIN THE PACK
Our forums are full of great advice, tips, and an always-helpful community. You can ask anything, and we‚Äôll answer faster than you can sprint up a hill.       üèîÔ∏è     Visit the Forum

HEAR IT FROM THE CREW
Here‚Äôs just one example of a happy rider in our forum! All our features and products are designed with direct feedback from awesome riders like you.


I am not here to spam your inbox‚Äîpromise. You‚Äôll only hear from me 4 times (including this email), except the occastional hot news!

You can reply to our emails anytime, and I‚Äôll get back to you.

Ride on  ~Alex

 

{unsubscribe_text} | {webview_text}

7.name: 1 of 3 - Quick Tour
7.subject: Unlock Your Full Potential with TrainerDay :rocket:
7.html_content:
Hi {contactfield=firstname},

Now that you're part of the TrainerDay crew, let‚Äôs take a quick spin through some of our top features that are designed to make your training smooth, powerful, and fun!

Below, you‚Äôll find everything you need to unlock your full potential, whether you're gearing up for your next race or just looking to level up your fitness. Let‚Äôs dive into the good stuff!

TrainerDay = High flexibility!
We try not force you into our way of training.  We give you options.  Here are some highlights,

FOR FREE

  • Download community plans and workouts for use on the platform of your choice‚ÄîZwift, Rouvy, IntervalsICU,  Garmin, Wahoo, and many more...
  • Create, find, and save workouts and plans for free and have your permanent library
  • Train using our indoor mobile app with 20 included workouts, allowing dynamic changes that create unlimited possibilities
  • Start a warmup in our training app in 5 seconds, and when you feel warmed up, pick what you are in the mood for without starting a new workout
  • Slope mode workouts instead of ERG.  Hit your own targets by feel
  • More... more... more...
PREMIUM FEATURES
  • Send your plans and workouts with "1-click" to most other platforms
  • Use our Training Calendar and sync your workouts to most of the popular platforms
  • Utilize the highly flexible Coach Jack Plan builder to create the perfect plan‚Äîuse your CJ plan "anywhere."
  • Automatically control your power with heart rate targets
  • Automatically sync your completed activities directly to Strava and TrainingPeaks

TIP: Search Workouts by Popularity
Seeing what others like is inspiriing.  Find an author and click on his name and find other interesting workouts.

We have the fastest workout creator.
It's fun to create your own workouts and then hop on your bike 30-seconds later and try your ideas out.  In this video 

Watch a 45-second video to this in action.
https://youtu.be/S-5R_O7BJ3w

There you have it.  A couple of quick tips to maximize your experience with TrainerDay.  We will have more tips coming each week.

CHEAPER TO UPGRADE ON OUR WEBSITE($3.99)

https://trainerday.com/pricing

Have a great day.  ~alex

 

You can always go to our

Blog        https://blog.trainerday.com
Forum     https://forums.trainerday.com
Youtube Channel https://youtube.com/@trainerday

{unsubscribe_text} | {webview_text}

8.name: 2 of 3 App Settings
8.subject: :crown: Training App Settings Highlights and More
8.html_content:
Hi {contactfield=firstname} Here are some more details features that could just help you get faster. If nothing else make indoor training more enjoyable and flexible.  Best of luck with your training.

Highlights: Cool Moible App Settings

  • Auto-extend workouts - turn this on and workouts never end, stop pedalling when you want to end your workout
  • Show power zones - see your zones
  • Premium Feature - Broadcast to mac, pc or tablet - see your training on a big screen.

Deep dive into app settings and highly dynamic training

https://youtu.be/ByJX9QT-fHs

Broadcast to Big Screen Video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UaNTxbT7dJk

PREMIUM FEATURE - Automated Slope Mode
Design your own hills.  It's perfect for shot intervals like 4-seconds for example.  It's also fun to get out of ERG mode and judge your efforts based on feel. 

Watch a 60-second video automatic slope mode this in action as well as adding interval comments.

https://youtu.be/DUVHWNUYRHI

Cycling Analytics
There are many great analytics solutions out there.  We keep it very simple on what we feel is the most important.  Weekly consistency regarding hours. See below

Strava does some decent reporting, TrainingPeaks and for deep analytics we recommend Intervals.icu. The easiest way to get your completed activities in Intervals.icu is to connect both platforms to Strava or Dropbox.

Best of luck with your training.

Cheaper when you buy direct!!!

Website: $3.99/month (or $39.99/year)
https://trainerday.com/pricing

App Stores: $4.99/month (depending on country/currency)

You can always go to our

Blog        https://blog.trainerday.com
Forum     https://forums.trainerday.com
Youtube Channel https://youtube.com/@trainerday

Have a great day.  ~alex

 

{unsubscribe_text} | {webview_text}

9.name: 3 of 3 Checking in
9.subject: Just Checking In‚ÄîNeed Any Help with Your Training? :blush:
9.html_content:
Just Checking In‚ÄîNeed Any Help with Your Training? üòä

Hey {contactfield=firstname},

I wanted to drop in quickly and see how things are going with your TrainerDay experience so far. Whether you're breezing through your workouts or feeling a bit stuck, I'm here to help make sure your training stays on track and fun! üö¥‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüí®

    If you have any questions or just want some tips on making the most of TrainerDay, hit reply! I'm more than happy to help with anything from workout tips to optimizing your plan.

    Looking forward to hearing how things are going! üèÖ

    Ride strong,
    Alex

    Have a great day.¬† ~alex

    You can always go to our

    Blog¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† https://blog.trainerday.com
    Forum¬† ¬†¬† https://forums.trainerday.com
    Youtube Channel https://youtube.com/@trainerday

    ¬†

    {unsubscribe_text} | {webview_text}
